overview: Hot young gym dudes tricked out in athletic wear take center stage in Get Your Ass In Gear! We've stripped away all distractions to focus on the fetish of chiseled hung hunks in jockstraps, shoulder pads, football helmets, knee pads, and protective cups getting it on like pros. These guys swallow hot cocks and fuck big bubble-butts like they're going for the gold! Put on your favorite singlet, jockstrap, or whatever it takes to get you off and Get Your Ass In Gear!
title: Get Your Ass in Gear!
